Mutilating Strike.name: Mutilating Strike
Mutilating Strike.fullText:
Blood-Crazed Berserker Attack 11Mutilating Strike

Your vicious strike inflicts an appalling wound that leaves your enemy reeling in shock and horror.

Encounter        Martial, Weapon
No Action      Special

Trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee basic attack using a weapon.

Effect: The enemy takes 1[W] extra damage from the attack, and it is dazed until the end of your next turn.


Published in The Book of Vile Darkness, page(s) 1-21.
Mutilating Strike.flavor: Your vicious strike inflicts an appalling wound that leaves your enemy reeling in shock and horror.
Mutilating Strike.trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee basic attack using a weapon.
Mutilating Strike.effect: The enemy takes 1[W] extra damage from the attack, and it is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Maniacal Fury.name: Maniacal Fury
Maniacal Fury.fullText:
Blood-Crazed Berserker Attack 20Maniacal Fury

Your towering wrath transforms you into a whirlwind of destruction. Relentless and uncaring, you strike out again and again.

Daily        Martial, Stance
Minor Action      Personal

Requirement: You must be bloodied.

Effect: You assume the maniacal fury stance. Until the stance ends, your at-will attacks using a melee weapon deal 1[W] extra damage, and when any creature ends its turn adjacent to you, you must make a melee basic attack against that creature as a free action.


Published in The Book of Vile Darkness, page(s) 1-22.
Maniacal Fury.flavor: Your towering wrath transforms you into a whirlwind of destruction. Relentless and uncaring, you strike out again and again.
Maniacal Fury.effect: You assume the maniacal fury stance. Until the stance ends, your at-will attacks using a melee weapon deal 1[W] extra damage, and when any creature ends its turn adjacent to you, you must make a melee basic attack against that creature as a free action.

Foaming Wrath.name: Foaming Wrath
Foaming Wrath.fullText:
Blood-Crazed Berserker Utility 12Foaming Wrath

Pain shatters what little restraint you retain, driving you forward to butcher your enemies.

Encounter        Martial
Immediate Reaction      Personal

Trigger: An enemy bloodies you with an attack.

Effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to 10 + your Strength modifier. In addition, you gain combat advantage against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn.


Published in The Book of Vile Darkness, page(s) 1-22.
Foaming Wrath.flavor: Pain shatters what little restraint you retain, driving you forward to butcher your enemies.
Foaming Wrath.trigger: An enemy bloodies you with an attack.
Foaming Wrath.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to 10 + your Strength modifier. In addition, you gain combat advantage against the triggering enemy until the end of your next turn.
